category.name: Thin Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MfgValidationTestFramework_EP_WI_MyMfgValidationsType_ClosureRule
preference.preference_description: Defines the closure rule the Manufacturing Validation Test Framework will use before executing the validation tests. The format of this preference is as follows: "MfgValidationTestFramework_<ClientIdentifier>_<ValidationTestSuiteTypeName>_ClosureRule" "ClientIdentifier" is a unique client identifier that communicates with the Mfg Validation Test Framework. "ValidationTestSuiteTypeName" must match the -type argument used during the 'install_callback' for a Validation Test Suite. The value is the name of a Closure Rule. This closure rule is associated with all the manufacturing test suites of this type. This closure rule will be run by the Mfg Test Framework before executing a Validation Test Suite. This is a closure rule that is relevant across all validation test suites within a registered type. Of course, each Mfg Validation Test suite can do any further traversal refinements within its own implementation.
